downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics GP 2013 Guide: Web Client Installation and Administration Guide
downloadDescription: These documents provide installation and administration instructions for the RTM and Service Pack 1 releases of the Microsoft Dynamics GP 2013 Web Client.
detailsSection:
Use the WebClientInstallAdmin_RTM.pdf document to find installation and administration information for the version of the Microsoft Dynamics GP Web Client that was released with Microsoft Dynamics GP 2013 RTM.

Use the WebClientInstallAdmin_SP1.pdf document to find installation and administration information for the version of the Microsoft Dynamics GP Web Client that was released with Microsoft Dynamics GP 2013 Service Pack 1. This document also contains information about how to apply an update of the web client, and information about using the new features that are included in the update.
systemRequirementsSection: To view the PDF files, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
installInstructionSection: Click Download to download the file to your computer.
